solution_line_template: First find the total amount of time Marcus spends blow-drying his dog: {bath_minutes} minutes / {blowdry_divisor} = <<{bath_minutes}/{blowdry_divisor}={blowdry_minutes}>>{blowdry_minutes} minutes
Then find the time Marcus spends walking: {walk_distance_miles} miles / {walk_speed_mph} miles/hour = <<{walk_distance_miles}/{walk_speed_mph}={walk_time_hours}>>{walk_time_hours} hours
Then convert that time to minutes: {walk_time_hours} hours * {minutes_per_hour} minutes/hour = <<{walk_time_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={walk_time_minutes}>>{walk_time_minutes} minutes

Then add up the time Marcus spends washing, drying and walking to find the total time: {blowdry_minutes} minutes + {bath_minutes} minutes + {walk_time_minutes} minutes = <<{blowdry_minutes}+{bath_minutes}+{walk_time_minutes}={total_time_minutes}>>{total_time_minutes} minutes
